pages.text: $(li)The Power enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:weapons/glowsilk_bow)Glowsilk Bow$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the damage from the $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) fires from the enchanted $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l).
pages.title: Power

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level V.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level VI of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_power)Ancient Tome (Power)$(/l).
